mapper.select: select R.reply_no, R.board_no, R.reply_content, to_char(R.reply_when, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as reply_when, P.attachment_no, M.member_nick from reply R left outer join profile_img P on R.member_email = P.member_email inner join member M on R.member_email = M.member_email where board_no = #{boardNo} order by reply_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_no, board_no, member_email, reply_content) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: select count(reply_no) as cnt from reply where board_no = #{boardNo}
